meanings.definition: Not consisting of parts or elements that are the same or similar in nature or kind.
meanings.sent1: The nonhomogeneous mixture contained various types of seeds.
meanings.sent2: The artist used nonhomogeneous colors to create a vibrant painting.
meanings.sent3: The nonhomogeneous group of friends always had interesting conversations.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were a nonhomogeneous blend of memories and dreams.
meanings.sent5: The nonhomogeneous landscape was a beautiful mosaic of different flowers and trees.

meanings.definition: Not uniform in structure or composition.
meanings.sent1: The nonhomogeneous fabric had patches of different textures.
meanings.sent2: The cake had a nonhomogeneous texture due to the nuts and fruits in it.
meanings.sent3: The nonhomogeneous arrangement of chairs made the room look quirky.
meanings.sent4: His music was a nonhomogeneous mix of classical and modern styles.
meanings.sent5: The nonhomogeneous clouds in the sky created a stunning sunset.
